title: Mom Of 6 Brings New Meaning To The Phrase: Making A Beer Run
teaser: Chris Kimbrough set a women's record running the beer mile. You run four laps around a track, stopping before each lap to drink a beer. Video shows her, at age 44, finishing in 6:28.6.
contentencoded: Copyright 2014 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
